Welcome to the How to Urdu Channel, a platform curated by Asim, a dedicated and enthusiastic YouTuber. At the age of 23, Asim hails from Bahawalnagar, Punjab, Pakistan. Despite lacking formal educational credentials, his journey is characterized by a relentless pursuit of his passions.

This channel serves as a comprehensive resource for acquiring fundamental insights into computer usage, internet navigation, and Android functionality. All tutorials are presented in the Urdu language.

For more information, please visit our website: http://www.asimalikhokhar.com/
You can also find us on YouTube: www.youtube.com/howtourdu
